docs.title: AI Agent Portfolio Builder
docs.summary: The client wanted a new onboarding system that would:Drastically reduce the time and effort required to create a profileIncrease user completion rates during sign-upImprove the quality and depth of user data from day oneBoost initial user engagement and trustOur SolutionWe built an autonomous AI agent that activates immediately upon sign-up, using publicly available information to automatically construct a user's profile. Key features of the solution include:Autonomous Web Crawling: The agent uses initial user info (name, email) to scan public sources across the webIntelligent Data Extraction: It identifies and extracts key professional data, including roles, projects, biographies, and media linksAutomated Profile Generation: The system auto-populates a clean, editable profile, leaving it 70–90% complete before the user takes any actionSmart Gap Identification: If critical information is missing, the agent prompts the user with minimal, targeted questions to ensure the profile is completeThe ImpactFrictionless Onboarding: Users sign up and find the majority of their profile already built, making for a delightful onboarding experienceHigher-Quality Profile Data: Automated data sourcing resulted in richer, more authentic profiles, which significantly improved search and discovery on the platformProven Cross-Industry Versatility: The agent was easily adapted for niche industries, successfully sourcing data for actors (IMDb), developers (GitHub), and business professionals (LinkedIn)

chunks.text: AI Agent Portfolio BuilderThe ChallengeTraditional, manual profile creation process is often a major source of user friction. Forcing new users to fill out extensive forms from scratch results in high drop-off rates and incomplete data, which can undermine a platform's core value. The client wanted a new onboarding system that would:Drastically reduce the time and effort required to create a profileIncrease user completion rates during sign-upImprove the quality and depth of user data from day oneBoost initial user engagement and trustOur SolutionWe built an autonomous AI agent that activates immediately upon sign-up, using publicly available information to automatically construct a user's profile. Key features of the solution include:Autonomous Web Crawling: The agent uses initial user info (name, email) to scan public sources across the webIntelligent Data Extraction: It identifies and extracts key professional data, including roles, projects, biographies, and media linksAutomated Profile Generation: The system auto-populates a clean, editable profile, leaving it 70–90% complete before the user takes any actionSmart Gap Identification: If critical information is missing, the agent prompts the user with minimal, targeted questions to ensure the profile is completeThe ImpactFrictionless Onboarding: Users sign up and find the majority of their profile already built, making for a delightful onboarding experienceHigher-Quality Profile Data: Automated data sourcing resulted in richer, more authentic profiles, which significantly improved search and discovery on the platformProven Cross-Industry Versatility: The agent was easily adapted for niche industries, successfully sourcing data for actors (IMDb), developers (GitHub), and business professionals (LinkedIn)

docs.title: AI WhatsApp Assistant
docs.summary: AI WhatsApp AssistantAutomated Assistant for Managing Bookings and Answering Questions 24/7The ChallengeFor independent professionals and small businesses, WhatsApp is a primary client communication channel. However, managing the constant flow of messages manually was leading to significant business challenges.The team needed a solution to:Eliminate slow response times and missed messagesPrevent lost business opportunities due to delayed repliesStreamline the disorganized and time-consuming manual booking processProvide 24/7 customer service without being tied to a phoneOur SolutionWe developed an AI-powered WhatsApp agent that acts as a real-time assistant, automating conversations and managing client interactions.Key features include:Automated Appointment Booking: Intelligently captures booking details like service type, preferred time/date, location, and contact informationInstant FAQ Answering: Responds to common inquiries about availability, services, working hours, and more24/7 Availability: Operates around the clock to ensure every inquiry receives an instant, professional responseFollow-Ups & Reminders: Automatically follows up with leads and sends appointment remindersThe Impact10+ Weekly Manpower Hours Saved: Frees up significant time by automating booking conversations and inquiriesImproved Customer Experience: Fast, consistent responses lead to smoother communication and stronger relationshipsFewer Missed Messages: 24/7 uptime ensures leads and appointment requests are handled instantly, reducing response time

chunks.text: AI WhatsApp AssistantAutomated Assistant for Managing Bookings and Answering Questions 24/7The ChallengeFor independent professionals and small businesses, WhatsApp is a primary client communication channel. However, managing the constant flow of messages manually was leading to significant business challenges.The team needed a solution to:Eliminate slow response times and missed messagesPrevent lost business opportunities due to delayed repliesStreamline the disorganized and time-consuming manual booking processProvide 24/7 customer service without being tied to a phoneOur SolutionWe developed an AI-powered WhatsApp agent that acts as a real-time assistant, automating conversations and managing client interactions.Key features include:Automated Appointment Booking: Intelligently captures booking details like service type, preferred time/date, location, and contact informationInstant FAQ Answering: Responds to common inquiries about availability, services, working hours, and more24/7 Availability: Operates around the clock to ensure every inquiry receives an instant, professional responseFollow-Ups & Reminders: Automatically follows up with leads and sends appointment remindersThe Impact10+ Weekly Manpower Hours Saved: Frees up significant time by automating booking conversations and inquiriesImproved Customer Experience: Fast, consistent responses lead to smoother communication and stronger relationshipsFewer Missed Messages: 24/7 uptime ensures leads and appointment requests are handled instantly, reducing response time

docs.title: Light the Way To Your Next Moonshot

Light the Way To Your Next MoonshotWe specialise in design thinking, AI integration, and Web3 to power your next giant leap in digital innovationGet In TouchInnovation DiscoveryOur discovery process cuts through the noise to uncover and adapt to high-impact opportunities, ensuring we're solving the right problems from day one.Human-Centric DesignPowerful technology is nothing without a flawless user experience.

chunks.text: Light the Way To Your Next MoonshotWe specialise in design thinking, AI integration, and Web3 to power your next giant leap in digital innovationGet In TouchInnovation DiscoveryOur discovery process cuts through the noise to uncover and adapt to high-impact opportunities, ensuring we're solving the right problems from day one.Human-Centric DesignPowerful technology is nothing without a flawless user experience. We help you deliver products that are not only functional but also beautiful, intuitive, and a delight to use.AI ImplementationsSeamlessly integrate the power of AI into your workflows. Your unique challenges require a custom-fit solution. We build bespoke intelligent systems to level up your team's capabilities - in days, not months.Web3 & Decentralised SolutionsBuild the next generation of the internet. Our experts can guide you through the complexities of blockchain, smart contracts, and tokenisation to create novel, community-owned experiences.Innovation Opportunities: Everywhere, For EveryoneOur team of experts in emerging tech will work closely with you to identify and implement custom strategies.We combine creativity, cutting-edge technology, and agile practices to help you not only meet today's needs but also anticipate tomorrow's opportunities.Core ExpertiseDesign ThinkingDeep empathy and human-centered approach to innovationEmerging TechOur home is the cutting edge. We learn quickly, and powerfullyAgile MethodologiesFast value, high adaptability, and reduced wasteUX/UIBeautiful, intuitive user experiences are at the core of everything we doClarity in Days, Confidence for YearsIntensive design sprints to turn vision into reality.We don't just innovate for you, we equip you with the tools to do so yourself. By the end of our process, you will have more than just a product; you'll have a unified team, a validated concept, and a clear strategic plan to take your moonshot idea to market.The Framework for Your Next Breakthrough1FREE Introductory Session1 hourA brief but intensive session to clarify your business goals, define the problem you're solving, and align on your next steps.2Discovery Sprint1 - 2 weeksAn immersive and collaborative process where our teams ideate solutions and create the blueprint for your prototype.3Prototype Sprint2 - 4 weeksRapidly develop a clickable prototype that you can use to test your core assumptions with real users and stakeholders.4Build Sprint3 - 6 weeksBuild the core functional product, and outline the strategy and timeline of a successful launch.Case StudiesWinner-Takes-All DAO for Community GrantsA decentralised application (dApp) that enables communities to run transparent, competitive funding rounds.Web 3.0UI/UX DesignStacks' First Curated Multimedia NFT CollectionLaunching the network's first music, generative, and mixed-media collections.AI IntegrationDesign thinkingPizza Hut: Checkout RedesignExpert guidance to navigate complex technical challenges.Tech Stack AuditScalabilitySecurityToucanBox: Redesigning Sign-Up for Busy ParentsHow a user-centric overhaul reduced friction and boosted subscriber conversion.Bug FixingUpdatesPerformance MonitoringAI Agent Portfolio BuilderSlashing onboarding friction with AI-powered data sourcing.Bug FixingUpdatesPerformance MonitoringAI WhatsApp AssistantAutomated assistant for managing bookings and answering questions 24/7.Bug FixingUpdatesPerformance MonitoringFrequently Asked QuestionsI've already completed part of this process - can you just help me with a specific section?Modularity is at the heart of our process. Our kickoff meeting will assess the stage you are currently at, and discover where you want to be. We will always tailor our services to provide help only in the necessary and relevant areas that add maximum value, and avoid retreading old ground.How much is it going to cost?Project costs vary based on the scope, duration, and team required. A one-week Discovery Sprint has a different cost than a multi-week full process prototype & build engagement. We provide a detailed, fixed-price proposal after the initial session so there are no surprises.Who from my team needs to be involved in a Sprint?Our philosophy is simple; you are the experts in your business, we are the experts in the process.You will provide the primary decision-maker. Beyond that, we encourage you to bring relevant team members to participate in the process alongside us. Your team's deep knowledge can be invaluable fuel for the sprint, and allow you to more effectively take the process forward after we finish working together.Ready to Innovate?Let's discuss your project and how we can bring it to life.Contact OptionsQuick ResponseWe respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.Drop Us An Emailhello@lunim.ioGive Us A Bell020 3051 9057Office HoursMonday - Friday9:00 AM - 6:00 PM BSTSaturday10:00 AM - 4:00 PM BSTSundayClosedGet In TouchYour full name *Your Email *Company Name*Project BudgetEstimated BudgetI don't know yetI'd rather not sayLess than £500£1000 - £5000£5000 - £10000Above £10000Project Goals *Send Enquiry

docs.title: Optimizing Sign-Up and Homepage for Parents
docs.summary: The solution focused on clarity, convenience, and trust:Value-Focused Homepage: Clear, benefit-oriented headlines and visuals of children engaged with kits that immediately communicate "What is ToucanBox?" and "Why will my child love it?"Simplified, Chunked Sign-Up: Replaced the long form with a multi-step journey using a visual progress bar to minimize cognitive loadMobile-First Design: Re-engineered for seamless mobile experience with large tap targets, readable fonts, and intuitive layoutEmotional & Trust-Building Design: Introduced warm visuals and prominent trust signals like parent testimonials and "cancel anytime" reassurancesThe ImpactThe redesigned flow delivered measurable improvements in user conversion and satisfaction:22% Reduction in Form Abandonment: A/B testing confirmed the simplified sign-up significantly lowered drop-off ratesHigher Subscriber Conversion: More parents who visited the new homepage successfully completed sign-upSignificant Increase in Mobile Sign-Ups: Mobile-first approach led to higher conversion among core parent demographicOverwhelmingly Positive Feedback: Parents described the new experience as "friendly," "simple," and "welcoming" The original user flow suffered from critical issues that led to high drop-off rates:Unclear Value Proposition: The homepage failed to instantly communicate their unique benefitsHigh-Friction Sign-Up: A long, multi-field form felt overwhelming for parents, causing many to abandon the processPoor Mobile Experience: The flow was poorly optimized for mobile devices, frustrating users trying to sign up on the goLack of Trust Signals: Inconsistent design and weak CTAs failed to build the confidence needed for parents to commitOur SolutionWe conducted in-depth usability testing and rapid prototyping to redesign the entire onboarding experience with a parent-first mindset.

chunks.text: Optimizing Sign-Up and Homepage for ParentsThe ChallengeToucanBox, a children's craft subscription service, found its initial digital touchpoints were creating a barrier for its target audience: busy parents. The original user flow suffered from critical issues that led to high drop-off rates:Unclear Value Proposition: The homepage failed to instantly communicate their unique benefitsHigh-Friction Sign-Up: A long, multi-field form felt overwhelming for parents, causing many to abandon the processPoor Mobile Experience: The flow was poorly optimized for mobile devices, frustrating users trying to sign up on the goLack of Trust Signals: Inconsistent design and weak CTAs failed to build the confidence needed for parents to commitOur SolutionWe conducted in-depth usability testing and rapid prototyping to redesign the entire onboarding experience with a parent-first mindset. The solution focused on clarity, convenience, and trust:Value-Focused Homepage: Clear, benefit-oriented headlines and visuals of children engaged with kits that immediately communicate "What is ToucanBox?" and "Why will my child love it?"Simplified, Chunked Sign-Up: Replaced the long form with a multi-step journey using a visual progress bar to minimize cognitive loadMobile-First Design: Re-engineered for seamless mobile experience with large tap targets, readable fonts, and intuitive layoutEmotional & Trust-Building Design: Introduced warm visuals and prominent trust signals like parent testimonials and "cancel anytime" reassurancesThe ImpactThe redesigned flow delivered measurable improvements in user conversion and satisfaction:22% Reduction in Form Abandonment: A/B testing confirmed the simplified sign-up significantly lowered drop-off ratesHigher Subscriber Conversion: More parents who visited the new homepage successfully completed sign-upSignificant Increase in Mobile Sign-Ups: Mobile-first approach led to higher conversion among core parent demographicOverwhelmingly Positive Feedback: Parents described the new experience as "friendly," "simple," and "welcoming"

docs.title: Pizza Hut: Checkout Redesign
docs.summary: Repetitive inputs, unclear progress indicators, and poorly optimized mobile layouts led to drop-offs and frustrated users.The team needed a new design that would:Speed up repeat ordersMinimize cognitive loadImprove mobile usabilityStreamline data input (delivery info, payment, order review)Our SolutionUsing rapid prototyping and usability testing, we redesigned the checkout flow with a mobile-first, user-centered approach.Key improvements included:Returning User Recognition: Saved user data and preferences streamline reordersProgressive Disclosure: Cleaner step-by-step layout showing clear order stagesOptimized Mobile Inputs: Autofill, smart defaults, and chunked sections reduce errorsVisual Feedback & Confirmation: Inline validation, confirmation screens, and clearer CTA buttons enhance confidenceThe ImpactFaster Checkout Times: Returning users completed checkout 28% faster in testingHigher Task Success Rate: Usability tests showed 93% task completion with the new design vs 68% with the originalImproved User Satisfaction: Positive feedback highlighted reduced frustration and improved ease-of-useStakeholder Alignment: Interactive prototype helped communicate design rationale and gain buy-in across teams Pizza Hut: Checkout RedesignThe ChallengeThe original Pizza Hut checkout process presented too many steps and friction points, particularly for returning users.

chunks.text: Pizza Hut: Checkout RedesignThe ChallengeThe original Pizza Hut checkout process presented too many steps and friction points, particularly for returning users. Repetitive inputs, unclear progress indicators, and poorly optimized mobile layouts led to drop-offs and frustrated users.The team needed a new design that would:Speed up repeat ordersMinimize cognitive loadImprove mobile usabilityStreamline data input (delivery info, payment, order review)Our SolutionUsing rapid prototyping and usability testing, we redesigned the checkout flow with a mobile-first, user-centered approach.Key improvements included:Returning User Recognition: Saved user data and preferences streamline reordersProgressive Disclosure: Cleaner step-by-step layout showing clear order stagesOptimized Mobile Inputs: Autofill, smart defaults, and chunked sections reduce errorsVisual Feedback & Confirmation: Inline validation, confirmation screens, and clearer CTA buttons enhance confidenceThe ImpactFaster Checkout Times: Returning users completed checkout 28% faster in testingHigher Task Success Rate: Usability tests showed 93% task completion with the new design vs 68% with the originalImproved User Satisfaction: Positive feedback highlighted reduced frustration and improved ease-of-useStakeholder Alignment: Interactive prototype helped communicate design rationale and gain buy-in across teams

docs.title: Stacks' First Curated Multimedia NFT Collection
docs.summary: This custom-built solution was engineered from the ground up to provide the infrastructure that artists needed, enabling:Music and Mixed-Media Integration: The contract was designed to embed audio and other file types directly into the NFTNative Generative Art: It provided a framework for deploying collections created with algorithmic processesComplex Edition Releases: The platform supported multi-edition mints, giving artists more flexibility and control over their workThe ImpactThisIsNumberOne successfully launched several of the most iconic and groundbreaking NFT collections in the history of the Stacks network:Launching Stacks' First-Ever NFT Collection: The "Genesis Collection" marked the beginning of the NFT ecosystem on the networkPioneering Music NFTs: The "No. Stacks' First Curated Multimedia NFT CollectionThe ChallengeIn early 2021, the NFT ecosystem on the Stacks network was in its infancy.

chunks.text: Stacks' First Curated Multimedia NFT CollectionThe ChallengeIn early 2021, the NFT ecosystem on the Stacks network was in its infancy. The underlying technology and standards were still evolving, and there were significant bottlenecks for artists.Key limitations included:No Multimedia Support: Existing contracts could not handle music, audio, or mixed-media files, restricting artists to static imagesLack of Generative Art Capability: There was no way for artists to launch algorithmically generated art collections native to Stacks and BitcoinPrimitive Editioning: The standards for creating and managing complex, multi-edition collections were not yet establishedThese technical gaps stifled creative expression and limited the growth of the digital arts community on Stacks.Our SolutionInstead of waiting for official network standards (SIPs) to be developed and approved, we created ThisIsNumberOne, the first-ever multimedia NFT contract on the Stacks network. This custom-built solution was engineered from the ground up to provide the infrastructure that artists needed, enabling:Music and Mixed-Media Integration: The contract was designed to embed audio and other file types directly into the NFTNative Generative Art: It provided a framework for deploying collections created with algorithmic processesComplex Edition Releases: The platform supported multi-edition mints, giving artists more flexibility and control over their workThe ImpactThisIsNumberOne successfully launched several of the most iconic and groundbreaking NFT collections in the history of the Stacks network:Launching Stacks' First-Ever NFT Collection: The "Genesis Collection" marked the beginning of the NFT ecosystem on the networkPioneering Music NFTs: The "No. 1 Smileys" became the first music NFT collection on Stacks, featuring exclusive tracks from world-renowned artists Fatboy Slim and Chemical XNative Generative Art: The "Hash Ones" collection was the first algorithmically generated art native to Bitcoin and StacksThese collections set a precedent and provided a working model for multimedia NFTs long before official standards were ratified, paving the way for future creators and ecosystem growth.

docs.title: Winner-Takes-All DAO for Community Grants
docs.summary: The system uses an epoch-based, winner-takes-all model to drive excellence.Key features include:Onchain proposal submission and ERC-20 token votingAutomatic finalization of the top-voted proposal each epochTreasury distribution via revenue splitter contracts, removing manual frictionReact-based dashboard for real-time voting, proposal details, and funding transparencyThe ImpactDrastically Improved Proposal Quality: The competitive model motivated teams to submit more ambitious and well-researched proposalsZero-Friction Payouts: Automated treasury distribution eliminated manual workload and payment delaysEnhanced Trust and Accountability: Every step auditable on-chain fostered confidence in the fairness of the process Winner-Takes-All DAO for Community GrantsThe ChallengeDecentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO) platforms were struggling with grant allocation processes that were slow and opaque, with low community engagement.

chunks.text: Winner-Takes-All DAO for Community GrantsThe ChallengeDecentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO) platforms were struggling with grant allocation processes that were slow and opaque, with low community engagement. The reliance on fragmented tools, combined with voter fatigue and unclear incentives, resulted in mediocre proposals and inefficient use of community funds. The core challenge was to create a system that encouraged high-quality submissions and active participation.Our SolutionWe designed and built a fully automated, on-chain governance platform that transforms grant allocation into a competitive, transparent, and engaging process. The system uses an epoch-based, winner-takes-all model to drive excellence.Key features include:Onchain proposal submission and ERC-20 token votingAutomatic finalization of the top-voted proposal each epochTreasury distribution via revenue splitter contracts, removing manual frictionReact-based dashboard for real-time voting, proposal details, and funding transparencyThe ImpactDrastically Improved Proposal Quality: The competitive model motivated teams to submit more ambitious and well-researched proposalsZero-Friction Payouts: Automated treasury distribution eliminated manual workload and payment delaysEnhanced Trust and Accountability: Every step auditable on-chain fostered confidence in the fairness of the process
